claims.claim: Major reduction in production costs by 79%
claims.quote: the production cost fell to around 15,000 euros, a saving of 79%

claims.claim: Acceleration of production times from three weeks to five days
claims.quote: Acceleration of production times (from three weeks to five days)
Maximized marketing performance, with completion rates reaching 98%

claims.claim: Creative potential multiplied tenfold by AI
claims.quote: Creative potential multiplied tenfold by AI

claims.claim: 15,275% growth since 2018 recognized by Deloitte Fast 50
claims.quote: Today, with 15,275% growth since 2018 hailed by the Deloitte Fast 50, the Belgian company is achieving global success

claims.claim: AI-generated campaigns achieved 95% completion rate on long formats and 98% on fifteen-second versions
claims.quote: these AI-generated campaigns recorded a completion rate of nearly 95% on long formats and up to 98% on fifteen-second versions

claims.claim: Revenue growth from €0 to €42 million in 2022
claims.quote: Loop Earplugs, an e-commerce brand from Belgium, has reshaped the ear protection industry, achieving €42 million in 2022

claims.claim: Business grew to €126.5 million by 2023 selling over 5 million pairs
claims.quote: By 2023, Loop Earplugs had grown into a €126.5 million business, selling over 5 million pairs in a year
The company spent €1.5 million monthly on ads
Loop Earplugs, priced between €19.95 and €54.95, have consistently turned a profit since 2020

claims.claim: Organic revenue achieved 28.63% split of total revenue, exceeding 20% target
claims.quote: Organic revenue target = 20% split of total revenue – achieved 28.63% split
Organic traffic growth = "massive scaling at approx 3x" – achieved 340.49% growth YoY
